name: ShellShock: Nam '67
description:
ShellShock: Nam '67 is an action-shooter game developed by Guerrilla Games. It came out on 03-09-2004. It was published by Eidos Interactive. ShellShock: Nam '67 has a Metascore of 54, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play ShellShock: Nam '67 on PC.
